meanings.definition: The practice of engaging in multiple romantic or sexual relationships with the consent of all parties involved.
meanings.sent1: Polyamory allows individuals to have more than one romantic partner with everyone's agreement.
meanings.sent2: She believes in polyamory and is currently dating two people openly.
meanings.sent3: In a world of polyamory, scheduling dates can be quite the challenge!
meanings.sent4: Her heart was a canvas, painted with the colors of polyamory.
meanings.sent5: Polyamory is like a garden where love blooms abundantly.

meanings.definition: The state or condition of being romantically or sexually involved with more than one person at the same time.
meanings.sent1: Polyamory can involve deep emotional connections with multiple partners simultaneously.
meanings.sent2: John found himself in a situation of polyamory when he fell in love with two colleagues.
meanings.sent3: The sitcom explored the comedic side of polyamory with hilarious misunderstandings.
meanings.sent4: Her life felt like a whirlwind of polyamory, with love pulling her in different directions.
meanings.sent5: Polyamory is a tapestry of intertwined hearts and souls.
